name: Cybernetic Eye, Passive Infrared (TL-11)
description:
The passive infrared cybernetic eye is extremely sensitive to infrared radiation (ANI visual bands) and can "see" heat. Smoke, blown sand, and any sort of atmospheric conditions will interfere with eyes. They have a short range of 100 meters. This version of the cybernetic eye has a single-function and is easily recognizable as a mechanical implant.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
